TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ExpressionBuilder extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class ExpressionBuilder Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 在编译期间检索动态资源。

span.span: Retrieves a dynamic resource during compilation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 自动计算表达式结果页进行分析使用期间类。ASP.NET automatically evaluates expressions during page parsing using the class. 集合，这组成`expressionBuilders`中所含元素`compilation`的配置节。The collection, which is made up of the `expressionBuilders` elements contained in the `compilation` section of the configuration. 包含键/值对中的特定值。The contains specific values in key/value pairs. 值可以通过包括形式的表达式A value is retrieved by including an expression of the form `<%$ ExpressionPrefix: ExpressionKey %>` 在页中。within the page. `ExpressionPrefix`映射表达式以通用表达式生成器类型的形式进行检索的类型 (即， ) 或自定义表达式生成器类型。The `ExpressionPrefix` maps the type of expression to be retrieved as either a common expression-builder type (that is, ) or a custom expression builder type. `ExpressionKey`指定用来引用返回的值的密钥。The `ExpressionKey` specifies the key used to reference the returned value. 如果你选择实现常见的表达式生成器类型，你必须映射到在配置中的关联的部分名称的表达式生成器。If you choose to implement a common expression-builder type, you must map the expression builder to the associated section name in the configuration. 如果你选择实现自定义的表达式生成器类型，则必须表达式生成器映射到你的自定义的表达式生成器类，该类必须派生自类。If you choose to implement a custom expression-builder type, you must map your expression builder to your custom expression-builder class, which must derive from the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建对象。The following code example demonstrates how to create an object. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ExpressionPrefix { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串标识要检索的表达式类型。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that identifies the type of expression to retrieve.

value.span: 字符串，标识要检索的表达式类型。

span.span: A string that identifies the type of expression to retrieve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表达式映射到常见的表达式类型的配置中的关联的节名称或表达式映射到自定义表达式类。The maps the expression to the associated section name in the configuration for common expression types, or maps the expression to the custom expression class.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection
public: property System::String ^ Type { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指定表达式类型的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies the expression type.

value.span: 字符串，指定表达式类型。

span.span: A string that specifies the expression type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定用于确定表达式的值的对象的类型。The specifies the type of object used to determine the value of the expression. 在配置内的部分，或者自定义类，可以指定类型。The type can specify either a section within the configuration, or a custom class.
